text: Yep, we are still working on bulk imports in the new (with some nifty new functionality as well :wink: )
Has anyone dealt with creating share links with custom images (i’m building a bit of a quiz and want people to share a different image depending on their result)
Is there anything in dev environment that lets you do a site wide search+replace?
Yeah, this happened to be bug/surprising change in Chrome 72's flexbox rendering that affected many of our apps. We’ve made some core fixes that should start to roll out early next week
